import "./intro.css"; import Me from "../../img/me.png"; const Intro = () => { return (

Hello, my name is

Aashia Mehta

Software Engineer
Graduate Student
Creator
Swimmer
Adventurer

It's nice to meet you! I work as a software engineer at Meta, formerly known as Facebook. I am currently based in the Bay Area.

); }; export default Intro;
